Our hotel have partnered with Ecolab, a global leader in infection prevention solutions and expertise, and are using their disinfectant cleaner 2.0, effective in killing 30 pathogens, to clean and disinfect all indoor areas as well as the air conditioning systems. 

As for air-conditioning system, each hotel room has its own independent pipe, which connects to the main fan on the roof of all hotels, allowing fresh air to be drawn from the outside to each room, and through an disinfected air filter. All drain outlets are regularly disinfected with 1:99 bleach water. The hotel sewage pipe system is discharged through an independent drainage pipe and vent system. Furthermore, there is an independent pipe supplying fresh air to each room, this prevents negative pressure on the airflow and the U-shaped traps from drying out.

We have installed an AI thermal scanner to detect elevated skin temperature, an AI Whiz vacuum cleaner to deep clean carpets.
